Tyrael: Then your challenge is accepted, Maxima! Come and do your worst.

He fired a wide beam of concentrated light at her face, trying to
blind her and overwhelm her optics.

Tyrael: So, you really think Alpha Trion has waken you for you to live
free? He might be Autobot, but the old geezer is no fool. You are
there for a purpose. Even the Tripredacus Council knew that!

He turned to Hydras.

Tyrael: By the way, Hydras, did you know that we were the ones
manipulating the Predacons all along?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> "If you desire, my precius "said the male while he moved away and he 
> waited 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > She growled as she watched Tyrael, then noticed Hydras. Almost 
> growling, she 
> > didn't need porotection, she wanted to feel the ripping apart of 
> another bot 
> > at her claws once more... it had been so long. To taste the fluids 
> & fuels, the 
> > whole sensation of terminating another pulsing through her 
> circuits. 
> > 
> > "Let me at him, Hydras," she growled & hissed in pain bettween her 
> razor 
> > teeth. "I want to show him what pain REALLY is!" Her 2 weapons at 
> ready, begging 
> > for a chance at the supposed transformer.
